# Bar plots

## Simple bar plot

This is a simple bar plot^[Or maybe it's not that simple after all.].

This is a new paragraph. <div class="tufte">Hello, world!</div>

::: {.marginnote}
Hello, world!
:::

```{r}
p <- ggplot(mpg, aes(x = class, color = class, fill = class)) +
  geom_bar(alpha = .75) +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "mako", end = .95) +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "mako", end = .95) +
  theme_rethink()

ggplotly(p, tooltip = "x")
```
